subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
Hiring and Promotion
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. reinstated the former New Orleans Saints defensive coordinator Gregg Williams, who was hired by the Tennessee Titans as a senior defensive assistant.
snippet: The N.F.L. reinstated the former New Orleans Saints defensive coordinator Gregg Williams, who was hired by the Tennessee Titans as a senior defensive assistant.
